# Route Background Arts - SOLution Game
# These files represent the background arts for different routes

# File: student_route.png
# Description: Multi-tiered educational hub with graduation, outdoor learning, library
# Status: Ready for integration

# File: working_holiday_route.png  
# Description: Backpackers hostel with cafe, outdoor seating, tram, Australian elements
# Status: Ready for integration

# File: graduate_route.png
# Description: Graduate at crossroads with business/casual groups, city skyline, jacaranda trees
# Status: Ready for integration

# File: offshore_route.png
# Description: Three-panel journey - airplane over ocean, airport terminal, offer letter scene
# Status: Ready for integration
